statement.p: Consider the following symbolic statement, where P is {{#P}}true{{/P}}{{^P}}false{{/P}}, Q is {{#Q}}true{{/Q}}{{^Q}}false{{/Q}}, R is {{#R}}true{{/R}}{{^R}}false{{/R}}, and S is {{#S}}true{{/S}}{{^S}}false{{/S}}.
Demonstrate how to simpify the negation of this statement symbolically.
Demonstrate how to determine if the original statement is true or false, and if the negation you found is true or false.

answer.p: The statement is {{#true}}true{{/true}}{{^true}}false{{/true}}. Its negation is {{#true}}false{{/true}}{{^true}}true{{/true}}.
